item.title: Roblox updates its safety systems and parental controls under outside pressure
item.description: Under outside pressure, Roblox announced updates to its safety systems and parental controls today to protect children. In a blog post, Matt Kaufman, ...

item.title: Our brains are vector databases — here’s why that’s helpful when using AI
item.description: Parallels between our brains and vector databases go deeper than retrieval. Both excel at compression, organizing and identifying patterns.

item.title: What Okta’s failures say about the future of identity security in 2025
item.description: 2025 needs to be the year identity providers go all in on improving every aspect of software quality and security, including red teaming.

item.title: Trump revoking Biden AI EO will make industry more chaotic, experts say
item.description: A potential repeal of President Biden's AI rules could mean enterprises will have trouble navigating state-specific laws.

item.title: Google Gemini unexpectedly surges to No. 1, over OpenAI, but benchmarks don’t tell the whole story
item.description: Google's Gemini-Exp-1114 AI model tops key benchmarks, but experts warn traditional testing methods may no longer accurately measure true AI capabilit...
